That means teams with coveted free-agents-to-be have initiated negotiations to keep those players from reaching the open market. And that includes [...]

items.title: Colts have ’tag’ option in dealing with Daniel Jones, Alec Pierce
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – The NFL has entered its “tag’’ season. Will the Indianapolis Colts play? Maybe. The franchise/transition tags are two of the restrictive/lucrative mechanisms possessed by teams as part of the Collective Bargaining Agreement. Depending on the level of the tag, it either keeps a pending free agent off the open market entirely or compensates [...]

Atop the list is Heisman Trophy-winning quarterback Fernando Mendoza, the presumptive favorite to be selected [...]

items.title: Colts’ 2026 lookahead: Quarterback, which means Daniel Jones

Whatever awaits the Indianapolis Colts as they transition from another unsatisfactory 2025 to 2026 hinges on Daniel Jones’ right Achilles. That’s the one he ruptured late in the first quarter of their Dec. 7 game at Jacksonville. A season teeming with promise essentially ended [...]

items.title: Colts cheerleader chosen for Pro Bowl
items.summary: The Pro Bowl isn't just for NFL players--cheerleaders make the cut, too. Indianapolis Colts cheerleader Cierra is among the NFL's best. She's a five-year member of the team and two-time captain. She'll join cheerleaders from around the NFL at the upcoming Pro Bowl Games. She joined FOX59 Morning News to talk about the honor.
